segments.text: Would you like me to go into a little more detail about the free services we can offer you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes please . I really am an absolute amateur when it comes to this stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . First of all , we can provide a business licence . Secondly , Enterprise ID Certificates , Forex registration and ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , ' Foreign Exchange Registration ' , for Bank Drafts , Bills of Exchange and so on . Also , approval of RIB accounts , capital verification and so on .
segments.speaker: S1
